item.description:
Lets try to get the Downtown Nashua Night Out events started again. There is a lot of interesting nightlife to be enjoyed in our own backyard. We will start with Brickyard Blues at Fody's.

About Brickyard Blues:
"Sure, we play blues... like BB King, Albert King, T-Bone Walker, Buddy Guy, and even Stevie Ray Vaughan. Then we add classic dance tunes from the Motown and Stax record labels, as well as R&B favorites as recorded by the Blues Brothers and The Commitments. We even mix it up with the hot rod energy of Brian Setzer and Eddie Cochran. In addition, we perform original tunes that range from jazzy ballads to outright rockers. It's the blues plus a whole lot more."

http://www.brickyardb...

About Fody's Tavern:
Come in, sit down and enjoy our classy, relaxed tavern atmosphere in downtown Nashua, NH. Our food is nothing short of mouthwatering. We look forward to meeting you in our fine restaurant!

Fody's Tavern features Live Music every Wednesday, Thursday, Friday, Saturday. Our cozy restaurant also promotes regular Comedy shows and special events.

Menu:
http://www.fodystaver...

Drink Menu:
http://www.fodystaver...
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign.
item.name: Nashua Night Out - Brick Yard Blues
